title: Update Xamarin.Forms to v4.2.0.910310
body:
**Description of Change**

Update Xamarin.Forms to v4.2.0.910310

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/1106
- Related to https://github.com/xamarin/Xamarin.Forms/issues/9129

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
